Package LMS.entities

Class RegionalDelivery

  • Object
    • LMS.entities.Delivery
      • LMS.entities.RegionalDelivery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Delivery>
    public class RegionalDelivery
extends Delivery
    A regional delivery within the Logistics Management System.

    For regional deliveries an express option can be set.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean express
      Flag value for express option.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RegionalDelivery​(long id, String from, String to)
      Constructs a regional delivery with specified id, pickup and drop off location.

      The id must be greater than 0.
      RegionalDelivery​(long id, String from, String to, boolean express)
      Constructs a regional delivery with specified id, express option as well as pickup and drop off location.

      The id must be greater than 0.

      If the id is invalid an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getTotal()
      Calculates the total amount (of money) to be collected at the drop off location in Euro cents.
      The price is EUR 1 per kg mass.

      • Methods inherited from class LMS.entities.Delivery

        addGoods, addGoods, assignCarrier, collect, compareTo, deliver, getGoods, isCollected, isDelivered, toString, totalMass

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • express

        private boolean express
        Flag value for express option. Defaults to false (no express).

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegionalDelivery

        public RegionalDelivery​(long id,
                        String from,
                        String to,
                        boolean express)
        Constructs a regional delivery with specified id, express option as well as pickup and drop off location.

        The id must be greater than 0.

        If the id is invalid an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        id - the id to set
        from - the pick up location to set
        to - the drop off location to set
        express - flag if this is an express delivery
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when invalid arguments are passed
        See Also:
        Delivery.getTotal()

      • RegionalDelivery

        public RegionalDelivery​(long id,
                        String from,
                        String to)
        Constructs a regional delivery with specified id, pickup and drop off location.

        The id must be greater than 0. If invalid an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        id - the id to set
        from - the pick up location to set
        to - the drop off location to set
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when invalid arguments are passed

    • Method Detail

      • getTotal

        public int getTotal()
        Calculates the total amount (of money) to be collected at the drop off location in Euro cents.
        The price is EUR 1 per kg mass. Express option has a 20% additional charge.
        Specified by:
        getTotal in class Delivery
        Returns:
        the total amount of money to be collected at the drop off location in Euro cents.
        See Also:
        Delivery.getTotal()
